attrPresence.name: presence
attrPresence.comment: controls the visibility of this object. Useful for fading an object in/out, or to specify a cut-out mask on thin single-sided geometry (eg. a complex leaf texture on a simple card).

attrCastsCaustics.name: casts_caustics
attrCastsCaustics.label: casts caustics
attrCastsCaustics.comment: allows continuation of caustic light paths.
